---
title: "IABEM Symposium"
---

The IABEM Symposium is the main conference of the IABEM. It is
typically held every two to three years.

### Upcoming symposia

The next symposium is planned for 2027 at [University College London](https://ucl.ac.uk)

### Previous symposia

- [IABEM 2024 Workshop, Shenzhen, China, December 2-3, 2024](http://www.iabem.org/workshop/)
